slickIHM

Class ExtendedTextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.util.InputAdapter
      • org.newdawn.slick.gui.AbstractComponent
        • slickIHM.ExtendedTextField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, IHMComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChampPassword, ChampTexte

    public abstract class ExtendedTextField
extends org.newdawn.slick.gui.AbstractComponent
implements IHMComponent
    Classe generique pour les textfields Une partie du code de cette classe est issue du code original de slick2D
    Author:
    Remynoschka, kevin
